first_name.description: Please provide the holder first name, exactly as it appears on the bank account document. Please match it exactly, with the same characters, same case. One exception: if the document mentions an honorary title, please don't provide it as part of the name. Ignored if field "legal_entity_name" is provided.

last_name.description: Please provide the holder last name, exactly as it appears on the bank account document. Please match it exactly, with the same characters, same case. One exception: if the document mentions an honorary title, please don't provide it as part of the name. Ignored if field "legal_entity_name" is provided.

legal_entity_name.description: Please provide the legal entity name, exactly as it appears on the bank account document. Please match it exactly, with the same characters, same case. If provided, fields "first_name" and "last_name" are ignored.

first_name.description:
Please provide the holder first name, exactly as it appears on the ID document.
Please match it exactly, with the same characters, same case.
One exception: if the document mentions an honorary title, please don't provide it as part of the name

last_name.description:
Please provide the holder last name, exactly as it appears on the ID document birth name.
Please match it exactly, with the same characters, same case.
One exception: if the document mentions an honorary title, please don't provide it as part of the name

ordered_signers.description: Enable an ordered workflow, each signer will be requested to sign in a sequential order

email_custom_note.example: Please sign these documents as soon as possible.

labels.description: Labels associated to the Signature Request

ordered_signers.description: Enable an ordered workflow, each signer will be requested to sign in a sequential order

email_custom_note.description: A custom note added to emails sent to signers.
email_custom_note.example: Please sign these documents as soon as possible.

expiration_date.description: Due date of the signature request (yyyy-mm-dd). Default to 6 month after the activation.

template_id.description: Create a signature request from an existing template.

external_id.description: Store a custom id that will be added to webhooks & appended to redirect urls.

branding_id.description: Use a specific branding to customize the signature experience.

custom_experience_id.description: Use a specific Custom Experience to customize the signature experience.

documents.description: You can directly attach orphan documents to the signature request.

signers.description: Can only be used if you add documents at the same time.

workspace_id.description: Scope the signature request to a specific workspace. If template_id is filled and Template is already linked to a Workspace, keep this field to null ; the created Signature Request will be scoped to Template's Workspace.

audit_trail_locale.description: Define the locale for the generated audit trail.

signers_allowed_to_decline.description: Allowing signers to decline to sign.

ordered_signers.description: Enable an ordered workflow, each signer will be requested to sign in a sequential order

email_custom_note.example: Please sign these documents as soon as possible.

custom_experience_id.description: Use a specific Custom Experience to customize the signature experience.

signers_allowed_to_decline.description: Allowing signers to decline to sign.

workspace_id.description: Transfer the Signature Request into a given Workspace.

audit_trail_locale.description: Define the locale for the generated audit trail.

SignerConsentRequest.description: Signer Consent Request attached to a Signature Request

id.description: Unique identifier of the Signer Consent Request

type.description: Type of the Signer Consent Request

optional.description: Define if the Signer Consent Request is optional for Signers

signer_ids.description: Ids of Signers to request a consent

type.description: Type of the Signer Consent Request

optional.description: Define if the Signer Consent Request is optional for Signers

signer_ids.description: Ids of Signers to request a consent

insert_after_id.description: Insert just after the position of the specified Signer Consent Request id

optional.description: Define if the Signer Consent Request is optional for Signers

insert_after_id.description: Insert just after the position of the specified Signer Consent Request id

SignerDocumentRequest.description: Signer Document Request attached to a Signature Request

id.description: Unique identifier of the Signer Document Request

optional.description: Define if the document request is optional for the Signers

signer_ids.description: Ids of Signers to request a document

electronic_seal_document_id.description: Id of the Electronic Seal Document. The Electronic Seal must be done to use its Electronic Seal Document.

insert_after_id.description: Insert just after the position of the specified Document id.

nature.description: Files in JPEG, JPG, and PNG format can only be of attachment nature.

insert_after_id.description: Insert just after the position of the specified document id

password.description: The password required to unlock the document if it is protected

name.description: The new name to be assigned to the document. This value should contain any characters except "\", "/" and can\'t start and finish with a space.

width.description: If not set, the width is automatically calculated with the max_length value

height.description: The height must be 24 or a multiple of 15 greater than 24. If height is provided, max_length must be less than or equal to the maximum number of characters based on the width and height of the text field.

size.description: The size determines both the width and height of the checkbox.

optional.description: Does the Signer has to select one of the radio buttons from this group?

height.description: The height must be 24 or a multiple of 15 greater than 24. If height is provided, max_length must be less than or equal to the maximum number of characters based on the width and height of the text field.

width.description: If not set, the width is automatically calculated with the max_length value

text.description: This property holds the content displayed in the read-only text field.
text.example: Please, read the whole document before to sign it.

CreateFollowers.description: A list of Follower objects to be added to the signature request.

Metadata.description:
Metadata allows you to attach extra information to your Signature Requests.
This field must contain JSON data (key / value), with 10 nodes maximum.
Each node key can have 30 characters maximum.
Each node value can contain a string (limited to 255 characters), a boolean, an integer or a float.
HTML content is not allowed.
Metadata.title: Signature Request Metadata
